request.title: routing/multicast Parcel Schema
request.description: routing/multicast profile parcel schema for request

localConfig.description: Set Replicator is local to this device and Set number of joins per group the router supports

local.description: Replicator is local to this device

threshold.description: Set number of joins per group the router supports

ssmRangeConfig.description: turn SSM on/off and Set Access List for PIM SSM

range.description: Set Access List for PIM SSM

sptThreshold.description: Set when PIM router joins the SPT (kbps)

joinPruneInterval.description: Set interval at which PIM multicast traffic can join or be removed from RPT or SPT

groupList.description: Set IP Access List for PIM RP Candidate

mask.description: Hash Mask length for RP selection

connectSourceIntf.description: Set MSDP peer ip connect-source interface

remoteAs.description: Set MSDP peer ip remote autonomous system number

keepaliveInterval.description: Set MSDP peer ip keepalive interval

keepaliveHoldTime.description: Set MSDP peer ip keepalive hold time

saLimit.description: Set MSDP peer ip SA limit message number

documentation.description: This is the documentation for request schema for routing/multicast profile parcel
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema
